---
title: "Paying the team"
---

**Let's Do Digital** is dedicated to creating educational content in the field of digital healthcare. It also hopes to one day be able to build digital systems to improve healthcare. The main income for Let's Do Digital is through sponsorship. We believe that these monies should be fairly shared with those involved in helping Let's Do Digital run. Hence, Let's Do Digital sets out these criteria for paying those involved it its ongoings.

### Educational materials

* This includes webinars and courses.
* After expenses and a 10% payback into Let's Do Digital for future endeavours, the profits will be divided across the hours input by the team member. 
* For a chair of a session, they can get up to one hour preparation time for every one hour of the session.
* For new material covered in webinars and teaching session, the speaker can get up to 3 hours of preparation time for every one hour of the session.
* For previously covered materials, the speaker can get up to 1 hour of preparation time for every one hour of the session.
* For tutors, they can claim up to one hour of preparation time for every one hour of teaching.
